bool is_vowel(char c) {
    static const char vowels[] = {'a','e','i','o','u','y','A','E','I','O','U','Y'};
    for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++) {
        if (c == vowels[i]) {
            return true;
        }
    }
    return false;

            else if (c == '1') even1++;
        } else { // odd index
            if (c == '0') odd0++;
            else if (c == '1') odd1++;

    int min_changes = (len1 - option1) < (len1 - option2) ? (len1 - option1) : (len1 - option2);
    char second_step_output[20];
    sprintf(second_step_output, "%d", min_changes);

    // Process third step

    bool found = false;
    for (int i = len2 - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        char c = second_step_output[i];
        if (c == ' ' || c == '?') {

        } else {
            if (is_vowel(c)) {

            } else {
                printf("NO\n");
            }
            found = true;
